page_content: The page discusses traffic restrictions in Bern due to a women's run event.
The page provides information on tax deductions related to private vehicle expenses for commuting.
The page reports an incident where a car hit two men who were directing traffic at a construction site.
The page provides information on tax deductions for parents with adult children in initial education or training.
The page informs about expected high traffic due to concerts in Stade de Suisse, Bern, and recommends using public transport.
The page provides comprehensive information for private guardianship roles, including legal and administrative aspects.
The page discusses a new guide created to assist members of social services in implementing changes in social welfare laws.
The page informs about expected traffic disruptions in the Wankdorf area of Bern due to an Andreas Gabalier concert.
The page discusses a competition for the design of a new medical research center in Bern, focusing on the needs of six institutes of the medical faculty at the University of Bern.
